Testing TAB and SPC
===================

Test 1: TAB function
A        B         C
1        2         3

Test 2: SPC function
A     B     C
X          Y

Test 3: Multiple TAB positions
    *         *         *
         Centered

Test 4: Various SPC counts
Gap1 Gap2  Gap3   End

Test 5: TAB in FOR loop
     1 
          2 
               3 

Test 6: TAB and SPC together
    Start   Middle   End

Test 7: TAB with expressions
              At column 15
                   At column 20

Test 8: SPC with expressions
A    B        C

TAB/SPC tests complete!
